name: Melodream
description:
This game was made in 1 week for the BrackeysGameJam2022.1

Theme: It Is Not Real

We are Noctis Games and this is our first prototype of the game Melodream.

Game Controls:

Space:         Jump

X:        Dash  (Nintendo Y or A)

C:        Climb  (L2)

ArrowKeys:     Move

Credits:

Programming:     Mitja Galkin / Markus Löffler

Visuals:         Roger Sala / Markus Löffler

Level Design:     Markus Löffler / Mia Kopf

Music:         Simon Wehrle

We will work at the game after the Brackeys gamejam and try to fix all bugs and polish the movement, maps and story. It is probably super broken at the moment.
